channel.title: BigStats on REDtalks.live
channel.description: Recent content in BigStats on REDtalks.live

item.title: REDtalks.live #041 - Grafana Dashboard update for SSL stats
item.description: Watch this episode to see how you can view F5 BIG-IP SSL statistics in the latest Grafana Dashboard for the BigStats telemetry exporter. Well, I know I already posted the end of year wrap-up episode (REDtalks.

item.title: REDtalks.live #037 - BigStats v0.4 released
item.description: BigStats v0.4 has been released! Yay!!! Way back in REDtalks.live #32 – Stats & Dashboards (May 25th) I demonstrated a prototype solution for getting useful data out of a BIG-IP and into various telemetry pipelines… Well, that was version 0.
